attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash -ex

sudo apt-key adv --keyserver hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com:80 --recv 2930ADAE8CAF5059EE73BB4B58712A2291FA4AD5
echo "deb [ arch=amd64,arm64 ] https://repo.mongodb.org/apt/ubuntu xenial/mongodb-org/3.6 multiverse" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mongodb-org-3.6.list

sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install -y mongodb-org
sudo apt-get install -y git
git clone "@@{MongoDB.git_url}@@"/"@@{MongoDB.git_repo}@@".git

sudo ufw allow 27017
sudo cp "@@{MongoDB.git_repo}@@"/mongod.conf /etc/
sudo service mongod start
sleep 10

mongo demodb < "@@{MongoDB.git_repo}@@"/peakJson.js

#script

print "Uninstall goes here"

action_list.name: action_install

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash


curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_8.x | sudo -E bash -
sudo apt-get install -y nodejs

sudo apt-get install -y git
sudo apt-get install -y unzip
sudo apt-get update -y openssl
sudo apt-get install -y openssh-server

sudo ufw allow 22
sudo ufw allow 3000

sudo mkdir -p /var/www/html
sudo chmod -R 755 /var/www
git clone "@@{NodeJS.git_url}@@"/"@@{NodeJS.git_repo}@@".git
sudo cp "@@{NodeJS.git_repo}@@"/nodejs.service /usr/lib/systemd/system/
sudo unzip "@@{NodeJS.git_repo}@@"/CalmDemoNodeJS.zip -d /var/www/html/
sudo sed -i 's/MONGODB_IP_ADDRESS/'"@@{MongoDB.address}@@"'/g' /var/www/html/app.js
sudo chmod 755 /var/www/html/app.js
sudo chmod 755 /var/www/html/models
sudo chmod 644 /var/www/html/models/peakModel.js
sudo chmod 755 /var/www/html/routes
sudo chmod 644 /var/www/html/routes/peakRoutes.js
sudo chmod 644 /var/www/html/package.json
sudo chmod 644 /var/www/html/routes/infoRoutes.js
cd /var/www/html
sudo npm install express
sudo npm install mongoose
sudo npm install pm2 -g

sudo /usr/bin/pm2 start /var/www/html/app.js

action_list.name: action_install

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application

#!/bin/bash


sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install -y nginx
sudo apt-get install -y git
sudo apt-get install -y unzip

sudo ufw allow 80

sudo systemctl start nginx
sudo systemctl enable nginx
git clone "@@{NginX.git_url}@@"/"@@{NginX.git_repo}@@".git
sudo rm -f /var/www/html/*
sudo unzip "@@{NginX.git_repo}@@"/html.zip -d /var/www/html/

sudo sed -i 's/NODEJS_IP_ADDRESS/'"@@{NodeJS.address}@@"'/g' /var/www/html/js/data.js

sudo chmod 644 /var/www/html/index.html
sudo chmod 755 /var/www/html/js
sudo chmod 644 /var/www/html/js/*
sudo chmod 755 /var/www/html/css
sudo chmod 644 /var/www/html/css/*
sudo chmod 755 /var/www/html/images
sudo chmod 644 /var/www/html/images/*

#!/bin/bash -ex

sudo apt-key adv --keyserver hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com:80 --recv 2930ADAE8CAF5059EE73BB4B58712A2291FA4AD5
echo "deb [ arch=amd64,arm64 ] https://repo.mongodb.org/apt/ubuntu xenial/mongodb-org/3.6 multiverse" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mongodb-org-3.6.list

sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install -y mongodb-org
sudo apt-get install -y git
git clone "@@{MongoDB.git_url}@@"/"@@{MongoDB.git_repo}@@".git

sudo ufw allow 27017
sudo cp "@@{MongoDB.git_repo}@@"/mongod.conf /etc/
sudo service mongod start
sleep 10

mongo demodb < "@@{MongoDB.git_repo}@@"/peakJson.js

#script

print "Uninstall goes here"

#!/bin/bash

sudo apt-get install -y git

sudo systemctl start nginx
sudo systemctl enable nginx
git clone "@@{NginX.git_url}@@"/"@@{NginX.git_repo}@@".git
